1. The custom of singing is useful, and is to be adopt- ed in the assemblies of Christianis, as well in public as in private. For it has (as you see) the approbation of the Apostles3 and also that of the more antient Fathers3 of Justin Martyr, in Quaest. a Gentibus positis, quaest. 107: of Augustine, Confess. lib. 9, cap. 6 and 73 and lib. 10, cap. 33 : in which places this same seems to have been the opinion of Ambrose and Athanasius.
